channel.title: Help me please this is a serious question (read more plz)
channel.description: how could i run my server with my router but not port foward and be able to do hosting my server another way like could i use my router to multi task in between me xbox and my computer. but what i mean is like could i use utorrent, no-ip to be able to run my server just like how i run my server without port fowarding and i used it with utorrent and no-ip when i didnt have router?

item.title: Help me please this is a serious question (read more plz)
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

i dont know how utorrent works but ive seen videos were people use utorrent and no-ip to host there servers.
but ive heard when doing that it laggs with like 50+ players so i just went ahead n portforwarde for my server. but if utorrent is way you wanna go then look videos up on youtube

Read full topic
